Objective: Verify navigating to Subscriptions page from My Account Subscriptions link
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click My account header and click My Account
2) Click 'Subscriptions' link
Expected Result: The User should be taken to Subscriptions Page
Actual Result: The User is taken to Subscriptions Page

2) Click Subsciptions in right column options

Objective: Verify the Subscriptions Page functionality in all the supported environments
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login

2) Click Subscriptions in right column options
